00021 #define RPRIMITIVE_T template<class T>
00022 #define RPRIMITIVE RPrimitive<T> 
00023 
00024 RPRIMITIVE_T
00025 RPRIMITIVE::RPrimitive() { }
00026 
00027 RPRIMITIVE_T
00028 RPRIMITIVE::RPrimitive(T v) {
00029   value = v;
00030 }
00031 
00032 
00033 RPRIMITIVE_T
00034 std::string RPRIMITIVE::getStringRepresentation() const {
00035     std::ostringstream oss; oss<<value; return oss.str();
00036 }
00037 
00038 RPRIMITIVE_T
00039 bool RPRIMITIVE::loadFromStringRepresentation(const std::string&s) {
00040     std::istringstream iss(s);
00041     iss>>value;
00042     return !iss.fail();
00043 }
